attributes.action: Protect the public and stop reducing staffing within the Probation Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current climate when it is expected that crime will rise, it has been decided that there is to be a reduction in the Probation budget and there are to be many redundancies within the Probation Service and Probation Trusts. The Probation Service was founded to protect the public and is already understaffed. To reduce staff further puts the public at risk.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Protect the public and stop reducing staffing within the Probation Service."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20419
